1.0.0.name: wordpress/facebook-page-albums
1.0.0.description:
"Facebook Page Albums" connect Facebook Graph API, then get albums/photos from your Facebook Page.

Once set up the API key and Facebook Page's address in admin panel, you can call facebook_page_albums_get_album_list or facebook_page_albums_get_photo_list function to get album/photo list.

This version provide only a few functions, you have to develop your gallery page by using html and javascript.

Getting through API is slow, so please use cache system something like wp-super-cache.

Demo

"Gallery | JKA Singapore" is created by using this plugin.
